titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at White-hall, on the 26th of Novemb. 1691 being the thanksgiving-day for the preservation of the King, and the reduction of Ireland / by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gilbert Lord Bishop of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
